verses.verse: "When Israel <S%H3478><s%> was a child, <S%H5288><s%> then I loved <S%H157><s%> him, <S%H7121><s%> and called my son <S%H1121><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

They called <S%H7121><s%> to them, <S%H1980><s%> so they went from them. <S%H6440><s%> They sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to the Baals, <S%H1168><s%> and burned incense <S%H6999><s%> to engraved images. <S%H6456><s%>
Yet I taught <S%H8637><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to walk. <S%H8637><s%> I took <S%H3947><s%> them by his arms; <S%H2220><s%> but they didn't <S%H3045><s%> know that I healed them. <S%H7495><s%>

I drew <S%H4900><s%> them with cords <S%H2256><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> with ties <S%H5688><s%> of love; <S%H160><s%> and I was to them like those who lift up <S%H7311><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> on their necks; <S%H3895><s%> and I bent down <S%H5186><s%> to him and I fed him. <S%H398><s%>

"They won't <S%H7725><s%> return into the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> but the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> will be their king, <S%H4428><s%> because they refused <S%H3985><s%> to repent. <S%H7725><s%>

The sword <S%H2719><s%> will fall <S%H2342><s%> on their cities, <S%H5892><s%> and will destroy <S%H3615><s%> the bars <S%H905><s%> of their gates, <S%H398><s%> and will put an end to their plans. <S%H4156><s%>

My people <S%H5971><s%> are determined <S%H8511><s%> to turn <S%H4878><s%> from me. <S%H7121><s%> Though they call to the Most High, <S%H5920><s%> he certainly <S%H3162><s%> won't <S%H7311><s%> exalt them.

"How can I give you up, <S%H5414><s%> Ephraim? <S%H669><s%> How can I hand <S%H4042><s%> you over, <S%H3478><s%> Israel? How can I make <S%H5414><s%> you like Admah? <S%H126><s%> How can I make <S%H5414><s%> you like Zeboiim? <S%H6636><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> within me, <S%H5150><s%> my compassion is <S%H3162><s%> aroused. <S%H3648><s%>

I will not execute <S%H6213><s%> the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of my anger. <S%H639><s%> I will not return <S%H7725><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> for I am God, <S%H410><s%> and not man; <S%H376><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of you; <S%H935><s%> and I will not come in wrath. <S%H5892><s%>

They will walk <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who will roar <S%H7580><s%> like a lion; <S%H738><s%> for he will roar, <S%H7580><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> will come trembling <S%H2729><s%> from the west. <S%H3220><s%>

They will come trembling <S%H2729><s%> like a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and like a dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria; <S%H804><s%> and I will settle <S%H3427><s%> them in their houses, <S%H1004><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> surrounds <S%H5437><s%> me with falsehood, <S%H3585><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with deceit. <S%H4820><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> still strays <S%H7300><s%> from God, <S%H410><s%> and is unfaithful <S%H539><s%> to the Holy One. <S%H6918><s%>
